```{r}
#install.packages("R2jags")
library(R2jags)
library(lattice)
```
```{r}
N = 100000
for (i in 1:N) {
    y[i] ~ dbinom(p[i], n[i])
    p[i] ~ dbeta(alpha[i], beta[i])
    alpha[i] = phi[i] * mu[i]
    beta[i] = phi[i] * (1 - mu[i])
    logit(mu[i]) <- model1
    phi[i] ~ prior1
  }
  
```
